name: Brian Lara Cricket
description: The ball is flying faster than you think. You're playing on gut reaction. Knock it for six and you're a hero - miss it and you're history. Shane Warne Cricket set the benchmark for cricket games on PlayStation and is now part of the Codemasters Best Sellers Value Range. Featuring ultra-realistic graphics, actual teams and cricket grounds, donâ€™t just watch the cricket this summer, live it!
